      • showCardSelection

        public void showCardSelection(AvailableCards cards,
                              TypeOfAction typeOfAction,
                              java.util.List<javafx.scene.image.Image> images,
                              boolean noOption)
        Loads the screen for the card selection
        Parameters:
        cards - AvailableCards message with the index of the usable cards
        typeOfAction - typeOfAction associated with the use of the cards
        images - List of Image of the cards to show
        noOption - true if the player can click close on the window

      • showEffectSelection

        public void showEffectSelection(AvailableEffects availableEffects,
                                boolean noOption)
        Loads the screen for the effect selection
        Parameters:
        availableEffects - availableEffects message with the index of the usable effects
        noOption - true if the player can click close on the window

      • startPaymentSession

        public void startPaymentSession(PaymentMessage paymentMessage,
                                java.util.List<javafx.scene.image.Image> images,
                                PlayerBoardMessage playerBoardMessage,
                                javafx.scene.Group ammoGroup,
                                boolean anyColor)
        Loads the screen for the payment
        Parameters:
        paymentMessage - paymentMessage with the index of the usable powerup for the payment
        images - List of Image of the powerups
        playerBoardMessage - playerBoardMessage where are saved the ammo of the player
        ammoGroup - nodes that show the ammo of the player
        anyColor - true if the player can pay with a single ammo of any color
